name: Save the baby (SebasCraft990)
description:
History and objective:

In Save The Baby, you will need to fight aliens to get to the next planet. In the game you are a auperpowered baby, who is the only one remaining in the world after the aliens came and took everyone. You win by completing all of the 4 planets and saving the poor baby.

Planets:

The four planets are:

1. Earth.

2. Mars.

3. Uranus.

4. Baby planet.

(I wanted to make 7 but the time didn't let me, so I did just 4).

Controls:

1. "a" and "d" keys to move.

2. Space to jump and double space to double jump.

3.  Right click to shoot baby paciefiers.

4. Left click to attack the enemys by giving them sp

Designers:

Programmer: Sebastián Botto, using Visual Studio and the Unity Game Engine.

Artist: Sebastián Botto, using Photoshop.

Music by: Sebastián Botto, using Bosca Ceoil.

Sound effects by: Sebastián Botto, using SFXR.

Me:

My name is Sebastián Botto. I am a 12 year old kid, who uses the Unity Game Engine to make games. I started in quarantine this year making games with Unity. I learned to program in C# while watching a tutorial by Brackeys about how to make a videogame for begginers. I've seen many videos about youtubers participating in Game Jams and I wanted to participate. I went to itch.io, where everyone uploaded their games, and started the jam (also, if I misspeled something is because my main language is not english, I learned english at school but my main language is spanish).
